name: corsinjector
title: CORS injector
description: Extension to inject wide-open CORS headers on-demand, either for a browser session of for given referrers
author: Josef Pfleger, Colin Frei, Frédéric Langlade-Bellone

preferences.name: headers
preferences.title: Headers to inject
preferences.description: Headers to inject in order to get CORS access separated by a |

preferences.name: auto-enabled-referrers
preferences.title: Referrers for which CORS should be automatically injected
